ratings.comment: Paul is one of the most influential people I have ever met. It's because of him I am fluent in Swedish. He met up with me outside of class on his own time to talk with me and make me more comfortable with the language. He is one of the sharpest people you'll ever meet. Fluent in 14 languages, super compassionate, hilarious and full of life! :)

Paul is a great instructor for swedish. Yes there is class and homework everyday, but the work was never too much to handle. He is hilarious and makes learning a new language super enjoyable. If you are looking to take a language class, take swedish with him!
Wow. That's all I have to say.
Phenomenal teacher. Entertaining, knowledgable, and authentic. Homework is assigned consistently, but it never felt like busy-work. His love of the language is infectious. Would absolutely recommend.
Never knew a lick of Swedish before this class... now I love it! Paul is a great teacher and made this the only class that I was excited about attending.
Paul is absolutely hilarious and he alone makes taking the class worthwhile. It is a very fun class. Paul randomly talking in different accents and his great sense of humor made my semester.
Really great guy! Knows his stuff.  Really easy.  He helps anyone who needs it. He'll definitely give you the helping hand.

Paul is one of the greatest instructors I've ever had - I greatly look forward to attending his class every morning. He's not only a great teacher, but a fabulous and hilarious person. He keeps you interested and prepares you very well for exams. You're missing out if you don't take his class!

Such a great guy - cracks jokes and loves helping students and creating student-professor relationships. Really knows a lot about origins of words and helps connect to English words. Flamboyantly brightens my morning. Prepares you well for tests using all kinda of materials. Makes sure students have input on our learning.
